statements.select: SELECT P.OTCProductId as Id, DisplayText as Label, COALESCE(OTCParentProductId,0) AS ParentProductId, COALESCE(OTCSubordinateProductId,0) AS SubordinateProductId, CASE WHEN OTCParentProductId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS HasAutohip FROM OTCProduct P JOIN OTCVisibleProduct VP ON VP.OTCProductId = P.OTCProductId AND OTCProductCategoryId = #Id# LEFT JOIN OTCProductRelationship R ON R.OTCParentProductId = P.OTCProductID WHERE OTCSiteId = 7 ORDER BY DisplayOrder
